website_summaries.verdict: A handsomely contoured 13-piece cookware set that is even more attractive in terms of its ability to elevate cooking.
pros: Ideal for both long days of perfecting dishes or creating quick, impressive meals
This hard anodized triple-ply set heats quickly and evenly
Reviewers rave about the products' ability to endure years of use
Handles stay cool to the touch
cons: Some reviews suggest stainless steel could be of better quality

customer_reviews.title: Handles are dangerously hot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a beautiful set of Cuisinart 64-13 Contour Hard Anodized 13-Piece Cookware Set; however, unknown to my family and me is the fact that the handles on the lid tops and on the pots (NOT the pans) become scalding and dangerously hot!! How can this be? Is this a design flaw? I'm sorry, but I could not recommend this product due to handles becoming so hot. We have a gas range so maybe that's part of the problem, too. Nonetheless, I would certainly expect a product like this made by a reputable company such as Cuisinart to have tested and thought through a solution to the hot handles.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roou

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Surface comes off in food!
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous product. Do not purchase. I have been using this set less than a year. This morning I made eggs and found tons of specs in the eggs. It turns out the specs are the non-stick surface of the skillet. Had I not noticed the black spots I would have literally eaten the lining of the skillet. I can't imagine how many times I have done this before. In addition, the rims chip, and the skillets fade. I have followed all instructions on cleaning and using proper cookware. This is a very dangerous product. I am reporting the product.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: best pots ever
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, best pots ever! Just make sure to handwash so the non stick can last. They cook amazing in med high heat and then you lower temperature and continue cooking on med or med low. My daughter and I love these pans sooo much that we're now cooking almost every day!!! To wash, just a drop of dishwashing liquid and everything comes off. You will not regret purchasing tjis set. And, oh, when they tell you it's 13 truly pots, pans and lids, not spatulas or any other utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Still works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought my set two years ago, still use it almost everyday. It's wonderful, it does what it said it would and its quality remains
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good, the pans and pots do not stick and ...
customer_reviews.text: My purchase price is at the medium low range. The quality is very good, the pans and pots do not stick and they wash easily. The style is quite attractive, which is a plus. The edges are rounded in such a way that liquid drips cleanly from the cookware. I would not hesitate to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a small family.
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans! Perfect for our family of 3. They're a bit petite, but I'm very happy. Love the cute factor, the curvy lines & lids that are interchangeable with 3 pans (they give 2 of those lids too). Easy to clean too. Great weight & heat quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set of pots and pans for the price. The nonstick coating is very good--just be sure to hand clean them! Handles stay cool even with high heat. I cook with gas, and have no regrets with purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. F

customer_reviews.title: Good looking as well as functional!
customer_reviews.text: I really love our new set of Cuisinart pans! Even heat distribution. Lids fit every pan. Nonstick and very easy to clean. The long pan handles do not get hot. You do need a potholder for the short panhandles and the lid handles if they have been on the pan for a long time. The bonus is the pans look great which makes them more enjoyable to cook in. I purchased several individual pieces to complete the set and I love all of them! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: None of the lids fit the smallest frying pan.  ergo:  4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE these pots, pans. Cooks food evenly, without sticking. So easy to clean by hand without scrubbing. However, for thicker, really-stuck-on foods, I do use the scratchless green nylon scrubbing pads but, [bolded and underscored} very lightly and after pan/pot soaked for about 4 hours in hot soapy water. I always wash by hand; only the lids go through the dishwasher. Only disappointment is the lack of a lid to fit on the smallest frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine100

customer_reviews.title: Wastung of money for 2 times cooking the  Teflon swelled and slipped off, wasting of money
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with this product, after two times of cooking the Teflon chipped off, and it's very unhealthy to cook already with pot, wasting of money, definitely will return the product and will contact with cuisinart support service
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these a good while now and I’m very lot with them. They hold heat very well. They come with a bit of a learning curve. You can’t just jack up the heat to high to get it hot fast. If you do, the pans hold that heat and you may burn whatever you’re cooking. Once they are screaming hot they don’t cool fast at all. Also, if you don’t want warped pans, don’t put them under cold water to rinse after cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Faerynuff

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cookware - has Everything!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking over these Cuisinart sets for quite a while. Then the price dropped, but did the quality? NOPE! I cannot yet speak to durability, but I have my fingers crossed. They have been a dream to work with thusfar. I have seared a roast on high heat then braised on the glass top of the stove. No warping. No lid problems in the oven or on the stove. Loving it all!!
customer_reviews.author: Caseysmama

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our condo and thought it was going to be worth the money. The product seemed to be well constructed with one flaw. We used one pan and noticed that after the third use, food was sticking to the pan. We followed the instructions to ensure proper care of the product. The frustration now is that in order to return it, we have to pay shipping out of our own pockets to get it exchanged. The pan itself is $17 at Walmart but to return it, we are expected to pay $8 to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick set
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I moved into a new apartment and decided to get a cookware set and I am so happy with this one! It is really nice and when they say nonstick they mean it! I had an older pan that I would make stir fry and other dishes in and by the end of the cooking there was always stuff stuck to the bottom. But not with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Addison Pavelka

customer_reviews.title: Attractive set works great not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Great product heavy handles are attractive and say cuisinart in them it’s a good looking set inside cleans up easy down side not dishwasher safe the outside turns a light gray if you care, otherwise wash them by hand
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for self or a friend. Or better buy two!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this set! Fits nicely in my cabinet. However not scratch resistant. I will watch my husband to make sure no forks are used on this set. I have a glass cool top and this is a great set for use on this surface. My other pans didn’t cook food well and warped very bad. This so far is not burning food or warping! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I would call them scratch resistant. Definitely want to use plastic cookware when cooking on them. Besides that, I absolutely love these pots/pans! When they say non-stick, boy do they really mean it. I looooove these pans so much, I just had to buy my own set after moving out of a friend’s house who had them
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rosas

customer_reviews.title: NOT induction stove top compatible
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because reviews/ answer questions section stated they could be used on induction cook top. They CAN NOT
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned a set of Cuisinart cookware for many years that is very similar to this. We were looking to replace a few pans that had become scratched (entirely due to our abuse). We were pleasantly surprised to see that many of the lids fit our older Cuisinart pans. Having used Cuisinart anodized pans for many years, I can tell you they are probably the best value you can get. I worked in commercial kitchens for years, and these stand up to abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pans two years ago and I am already shopping for replacements due to the nonstick coating showing wear. I have other older cookware that has a better coating that is still good. We only use nonmetal utensils and hand wash so these pots and pans should have held up better. So, like most people, I’m scratching my head wondering what I’m going to do with this set other than sending more substandard pans to landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainbird

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with this set that I purchased for my second home. At my primary residence I have All-Clad which I've used for years. This works every bit as well. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few weeks and its already started to chip. Im very careful when washing and I wash it with soft sponge
customer_reviews.author: Rufei Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dont ever think to buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Lost coating within a month and changed color for all the used items, Quality of this product is very bad. Add few more bucks and get other brand
customer_reviews.author: bEEs

customer_reviews.title: MEH - I really don't "LOVE" this set
customer_reviews.text: it's really not THAT great - it's just OK - the pans are too small for me - a great cook who uses them every day - have to use my old pans and have ordered more individually to fill in the gaps this set was missing - want to get more from a quality name like cuisinart!!! I used my birthday amazon gift card on this - and wish I would have gotten something else!!!
customer_reviews.author: XO

customer_reviews.title: they're a nice set. very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my GF for christmas, she loves them. they're a nice set. very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Strid3r

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!!! Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans! I use the frying pan every day for breakfast and lunch. I’ve had them for just over 2 months. Make sure you get spacers/pads to go in between them for storage as the bottoms can scratch easily. They are easy to clean. My omelets always turn out great in this fry pan! I would recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Paint washes off after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: The pans are ok, but not durable. I bought them because of reviews that talked about superior non-stick. The nonstick wasn't as great as the reviews said, but most disappointing is that the outer coating has washed off, leaving the set with a very weathered and unprotected exterior. The interior nonstick also scratches pretty easily, but that's the nature of nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans. Nothing sticks to them and they are extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Apps

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pans!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Mom. We love them. They heat evenly, and are easy to clean. They are not dishwasher safe and should be hand-dried to prevent spotting.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: First set of pots
customer_reviews.text: I was worried buying online but these pots are the best! I’m glad I purchased them. The clean up is easy, my food cooks evenly, I love I can wash them in the dishwasher as well as put them in the oven. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: great product. But the shipping was horrible. Package was delayed for 1 wk for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is great quality. I had purchased and returned several different sets before I found this one . My whole family enjoys using them . Tops and handles stay cool !
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Handles heat up to fast
customer_reviews.text: Great appearance. Handles and lids heat up to a point they can’t be used
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Buy ever
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome buy! The quality is exceptional.... for the price a must have.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Quality materials. Handles on lid do get hot when boiling, that's what oven mitts are for right? On the smaller saute pan the handle causes the pan to tilt slightly on the stove top so when you saute butter and garlic all the butter slides to the handle side. That is very minor overall
customer_reviews.author: Regular guy...

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know it wasn’t dishwasher safe. Who in this day and age makes cookware that can’t be put in a dishwasher? I did and the outside looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Nanadk

customer_reviews.title: Worth the reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great set of mixed use pans at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: GLB

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Size was smaller than expected and I already have scratches on the pan in a month
customer_reviews.author: Nyah

customer_reviews.title: I've bought pot sets that say non stick, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought pot sets that say non stick, but that was not true. But my set is "awesome"...is it non stick, "HELL TO THE YES"...and i "love it" !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't burn, durable and it looks good!!
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy another brand of pots!!!! The best I have ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Roman

customer_reviews.title: They are like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Here are some cheesy scrambled eggs for my 2 year old with zero grease, oil or cooking spray! It just comes straight off the pan like magic!
customer_reviews.author: Mackinzie McClure

customer_reviews.title: Beware, peeling off when you cook in it
customer_reviews.text: the contour hard anodize inside comes off when you cook in it...not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Set and great Variety
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pots & pans. We hand wash them but they are dishwasher safe. They have held up very well. Love Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: IntoTheFire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pot and pans set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pot and pans set! Easy to clean, but have to do it by hand. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and I love them. Just be sure to hand wash them every time
customer_reviews.author: Tobster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nonstick cookware I think I’ve ever heard and that’s really what I was looking for something easy to clean eggs don’t even stick good product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hein

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel and look of these pots
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and look of these pots. They heat evenly and I really enjoy cooking on them. The only downfall is having to wash them by hand.
customer_reviews.author: MS.BONNIE

customer_reviews.title: non-stick coating flacks off.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pots 2/2/2020. Today, 9/15/2020 the coating on the small pot has flaked off. In addition, these pots are thin and heat up to much, including the handle and the top. I always liked Cuisenart but these were a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Wilda Robinson-Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than your average pots and pans, but great for 2-4 people.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than your average pot and pan set. Perfect for a couple or a small family. Love the durability and the weight on the set.
customer_reviews.author: grelinds

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this set! I have had it for almost two years now and other than some minor scratches on the most frequently used pieces, it still looks new. Great function and durability!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Greifenstein

customer_reviews.title: PANdemonium
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT love the handles burn your hands so one star off for that. Hard to remember to always grab a pot holder even if just stirring, etc other sets i've had in the past had hard plastic, etc handles that did not get as hot as the pan. These look great enough you can leave them on your stove top if you wish. They work so great so far. Am pleased with the no stick. They are somewhat heavy as well, so if you have compromised hand/wrist strength or arthritis remember you'll need 2 pot holders and use 2 hands. I'll update after I've had them longer on cleaning and how they stand up to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would get five stars but the smaller pan lid doesn’t seem to fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Good upgrade to what I was using before. Good quality and look nice. Good deal compared to what you would find at most stores, so the set is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Chipped pot, otherwise gorgeous set!! I only buy cuisinart!!
customer_reviews.text: Have chip on edge of one pan. Love the style and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ida M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great pots and pans... and a really great price.  Like the kettle shaped design.  Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Do not wash in the dishwasher. Wipe the pot or pan clean with a paper towel. Then, a soap and water. Badda boom, badda bing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: only thing I don't like is the handles get to darn HOT!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: A high quality cookware set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The set was inexpensive but looks like a million bucks. I use them almost everyday. And there is also a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the product for a couple months and love them. Great quality and super easy clean up (most important for a new mom). Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Great set for price
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought these, I love them. Very easy to cook and clean
customer_reviews.author: CLMOORE

customer_reviews.title: Quality made product
customer_reviews.text: Even cooking with great heat distribution, very easy to clean but found it not to be very scratch resistant, fine if you use plastic utensils though
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Polkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good set 4 someone on a busy schedule
customer_reviews.text: Need to use plastic utensils. Used my metal ones. OOPS. Otherwise love the set. Perfect for steaming veggies, pasta,or stovetop quick meals.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Charette

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Cuisinart cook set
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Cuisinart cook set. I would recommend them to anyone. I have ordered a Utensil set to be received Sat July 7 to use with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Vetrano

customer_reviews.title: ... and pans and can already tell we’re going to love them! Best set I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Just received these pots and pans and can already tell we’re going to love them! Best set I’ve ever bought! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cigarza

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made. Very lightweight and not study. I am very disappointed in the quality. Also, the bottom heats up way too hot and stuff burns fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my pans for several months now and I'm impressed! They don't stick, clean very easy, and are lightweight. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: UNHAPPY CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I expected but great non-stick material and beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great produce
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good, and the price was excellent. Bought one set for me and one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: you can burn your hands off using the handles
customer_reviews.text: Really dont understand how you can sell pots that the handles turn to fire
customer_reviews.author: not what i expected

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have another set just like this one they lasted 8 years!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Adams

customer_reviews.title: HOT HANDLES - NOT DISHWASHER SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set of pots and pans. However, the handles get hot as heck and they are not dishwasher safe which I found out the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pinder

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the color.
customer_reviews.text: They are a dark grey not black and should be advertised as such.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on amazon because they were cheaper than comparable products in stores. I am really happy with them! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: skirby

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value, easy to clean, sturdy, I don’t need oil to do pan-fry
customer_reviews.author: WA

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m always about getting a deal, half the price of my local store
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best pot set ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m a stickler for good brand of quality cookware and these pots are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased when I opened the box. Love the design and the weight of the pieces!
customer_reviews.author: lcameron

customer_reviews.title: Lids are not good
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like these at all the lids are not very good they slid off
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This was a bridal shower gift for my future daughter-in-law ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a bridal shower gift for my future daughter-in-law and son and they were elated! They began using them immediately and loves the ease of cooking with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tripi

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use, washing, light weight. Great product. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eshwar Tangirala

customer_reviews.title: scratched
customer_reviews.text: We only hand wash our pans with wash cloths and use plastic spoons....and they still scratched! Disappointed. I bought these as a gift for my spouse and he is not happy with them now.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Hanley

customer_reviews.title: An amazing cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Thk. You it's great. Use it to all kinds of meals. Yes
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: This set is great for your everyday cooking
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for your everyday cooking. The features I like best is the even heat distribution, easy cleanup and the weight of the pots and pans is perfect for me! I think this set is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Joanuary1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cookware reasonably priced. Heats evenly, durable to hand washing. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Food cooks up great in these pots!! Non-stick, cleans very easy, well built. Good investment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is the way they wash in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: These pots distribute heat well and stack well. The only thing I don't like is the way they wash in the dishwasher. They clean well but no matter what detergent I have tried there is always a film left on these pots, frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Slick Cookware
customer_reviews.text: While we haven't used all the pans yet, we simply love cooking in the ones we have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: I Love the set,but there was a few nicks on two of the pieces that I would like to replace. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Floyd E.

customer_reviews.title: It is what is says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Hard Anodized Aluminum Cookware The handles are comfortable, and it cooks as can be expected. Yes It cooks evenly, and they are not cumbersome. Pros: They where priced well. Cons: The Tops could be better; however I don't believe any Cookware manufacturer is making actual good tops, that are both functional, and ergonomic. So they are all about the same. You know with the little hole in the top for draining, or steam release, or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Abdullah-Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set of cookware as a Christmas gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of cookware as a Christmas gift to my daughter-in-law @ her request. After using it for a couple of weeks, she told me how much she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lib

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pans!
customer_reviews.text: Handles never get hot, warm sure, but never hot. Use them almost daily and, if you dont put them in the dishwasher, they will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set to replace a cheap ancient stainless steel set. I couldn't get over how well each item in the set was packaged. They really took the time to carefully wrap each item. The cookware is awesome! What a noticeable difference in how well they cook food. I highly recommend this product. It's well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Have had this set of pots and pans for just over a year now and am thrilled with them. They have maintained their appearance and look just like new after a good amount of use, they are a joy to cook with, aesthetically very beautiful and make me want to be in kitchen all the more.
customer_reviews.author: Mair Heller

customer_reviews.title: Absolute JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: The pans I received are absolute junk and should have been thrown in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: I am still getting use to these pots and pans. I had my Farberware set for over 25 years. The Cuisinart set cooks evenly and quickly. Downside is lids and handles get hot so I always have to remember to use a hot pad.
customer_reviews.author: waz

customer_reviews.title: My new pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great. The lids are sturdy but light weight. They take up less room in my lids drawer. They are less glass with more coverage. The pans are wonderful and the non stick is really non stick! I use these on a daily basis and cannot find anything wrong wih them. The handles are sleek and stay cool, the pans need little oil and cook great. I would recommend them to anyone. Oh, by the way, what a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited about getting this set but upon ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about getting this set but upon inspection there were several scraps and scratches on the inside and outside of 3 of the pots. Cuisinart would not return my calls after I sent them pictures of the flaws. I returned the set. Cuisinart does not stand behind it's products. I will never buy another Cuisinart or Conair product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barker Coffman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. I like them better than similar ones from another brand that I had previously bought at the store. They are sturdy, non stick, easy to clean, and have held up to months of regular use. I use wood or plastic utensils on them (not metal). They are also a great set as far as sizes. You aren’t stuck with some giant pot that almost never gets used. Love them. Great pans, great price, easy and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is some extremely heavy duty cookware. I bought this set to replace my cheap Walmart set that is worn out. I could immediately tell that these pots and pans are high quality because they are about 5 times heavier than my old set. Handles are sturdy and well-attached. The inside of these are nonstick and food rinses off easily. They also heat really well on an electric stove. Overall, I'm really impressed with this set and I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I cook 6 days out of the week and these are absolutely wonderful! I looked for this set in stores so that I could make sure that I liked them and to also make sure they were sturdy enough. Went to bed bath and beyond and loved them. checked amazon and realized they had a better deal. I use these pots and pans daily and love how easy it is to clean them. You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Montes De Oca

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not dishwasher safe. Handles get EXTREMELY HOT. Scratch VERY easily. Heat distribution is good, that’s about the only good thing. I don’t like giving negative reviews, but, when you only buy pans every 6/7 years, these will definitely not last. Shame....feel like I wasted my money. Never buy. Cuisinart again. That’s all
customer_reviews.author: Sharn702

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Contour Hard Anodized 13-Piece Cookware Set,Black
product_meta.description:
64-13 – CUISINART CONTOUR HARD ANODIZED 13-PIECE SET
Elegant and robust silhouette styling for a professional look, maximize the volume and cook with added flair with this unique cookware! Cuisinart Contour Hard Anodized cookware exemplifies exceptional design with its hard anodized aluminum construction. The innovative, three layer construction offers unsurpassed durability and optimal cooking performance in a distinct silhouette unique to Cuisinart's Contour line.

Carefully selected to provide all the essentials, this cookware set will please home chefs by offering processional results with an elegantly contoured design that compliments any kitchen. Go beyond the basic with everything you need for cooking and entertaining right at home! 

Cuisinart Contour Hard Anodized cookware is boiler and oven safe up to 500 degrees, freezer safe, and safe for use on halogen, electric, gas, and glass ceramic stovetops. PRODUCT FEATURES
Superior Heat Distribution Aluminum core heats up quickly and enables even heat distribution for consistent results. No more hot spots! 

Premium Non-Stick Interior Reinforced nonstick cooking surface for healthier cooking, lasting food release and easy cleaning.

Keep Cooking Cool Maintain a solid grip with the always cool, always secure stick handles, contoured to your hand for extra comfort. Riveted to ensure a lifetime of balanced cooking. 

Steady Handling Professionally riveted stainless steel handles and side grips ensure a lifetime of balanced cooking. 

Convenient Tempered Glass Covers Sleek, flat glass lids with stainless rims seal in moisture and flavor. Glass is tempered for durability to ensure lasting performance. 

Clean and Easy Tapered rims keep pouring drip-free and easy. 

Ultimate Cooking Versatility Use on the stovetop, in the oven, or under the broiler. Oven safe up to 500°F and freezer safe for easy food storage. 

Lifetime Warranty

13-PIECE SET INCLUDES
• 1.5 and 2.5 Qt. Saucepans w/ Covers 
The saucepan is a favorite in the kitchen. Constructed for quick and even heating, prepare soups, sauces, and sides with ease. Elegantly designed to provide professional results in a sleek silhouette. 

• 8 and 10 inch Skillets
Designed for healthier at-home cooking, the nonstick skillet is every cook's kitchen essential. 

• 3 Qt. Sauté Pan w/ Helper Handle & Cover
An excellent choice for browning, searing, and slow braising, this sleek saute pan offers the professional construction and capacity to handle all your favorite meals. 

• 4 Qt. Dutch Oven w/ Cover
The versatile Dutch oven is ideal for simmering, boiling, and stewing, keeping food moist and full of flavor. 

• 9 Qt. Stockpot w/ Cover and 24 cm Pasta Insert
A stockpot is essential for making stocks, soups, stews, and chili. Big enough to handle your family sized meals. Enjoy boiling pasta or corn on the cob with your distinctly designed cookware classic.

Convenient tempered glass covers - sleek, flat glass lids with stainless rims seal in moisture and flavor; glass is tempered for durability to ensure lasting performance

Ultimate cooking versatility - use on the stovetop, in the oven, or under the broiler; oven safe up to 500-degree F and freezer safe for easy food storage; tapered rims keep pouring drip-free and easy
